# Eating Risk Red‑Flag Checklist (Non‑Validated)

## Behavioral Indicators

- Restrictive eating or fasting
- Purging behaviors (vomiting, laxatives)
- Excessive exercise to compensate
- Rigid food rules or rituals

## Cognitive/Emotional Indicators

- Intense fear of weight gain
- Distorted body image
- Preoccupation with calories/weight/shape

## Physical Indicators (Self‑Report)

- Rapid weight change
- Dizziness or fainting
- Menstrual changes
- Cold intolerance

## Summary Prompt

- List the highest‑risk indicators and any immediate safety concerns.
